subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{Han simp|隨|f=遀|t=迶}} in simplified {{w|Simplified Chinese|Chinese}} and Japanese {{w|shinjitai}}.

subSections.text: {{Han char|rn=170|rad=阜|as=09|sn=11|snj=12|four=|canj=NLYKB,XNLYK|ids=⿰⻖迶}} <!-- ⻖ counted as 3 strokes in Japanese -->

subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=c|rs=阜09|kyu=隨}}

# [[follow]], [[though]], [[notwithstanding]]
# [[while]], [[during]], [[according]] to
# to [[obey]], [[submit]], [[comply]], [[act]] as one is [[told]] to
